name: Healthy Living
description:
2D platformer game.   Little girl jumping and running through candy fields, picking what's good for her health, while at the same time staying away from dangers. Help her plan a healthy route avoiding obstacles on the way. 

Minimum requirements:

OS: Windows 8 or higher

Processor: 1.80 GHz Dual Core

Memory: 4 GB

Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 620m, GeForce 710, Radeon HD 7550m, Radeon HD 6450

Direct X: 11

Screen resolution: 16:9

Storage: 55.1 MB
